categories: Category:Alliance to Restore the Republic-aligned governments

nodes.text: The Royal House of Naboo was the planetary government of Naboo, with a system of government that was both a monarchy and a democracy. As such, the Monarch of Naboo was an elected office with term limits.
The Naboo Royal Advisory Council was a group of ministers, chaired by the Governor of Naboo, who counseled the monarch on matters of state.
